name: Classic Romance
description: 40 Purple and Pink Roses, wrapped around with green and pink hypericum berries and fillers. 10 Pink and Red heart hellium balloons

name: Evelyn's Bloom
description: “Pretty in Pink” features a lush hand-tied bouquet of premium roses in soft blush, cream, and pink tones elegantly wrapped to perfection. Accompanied by a customized pink orb balloon inscribed with a birthday message and two glossy heart balloons for that extra flair.

name: The Blue Royale Package
description: 1 Customized Bubble Balloon, 4 heart helium balloons, 1 personalized picture cake, bouquet of Mixed Roses

name: Sweetheart Surprise
description: A grand romantic gesture designed to speak the language of deep affection and timeless love. Package includes: bouquet of 50 Red roses with fillers, 2 Tier Rose Cake, Chocolate Gift Box.

name: Stacked With Love
description: A luxurious arrangement of 20 fresh pink roses delicately paired with N400,000 cash bundles — designed to say 'i-love-you' in the most unforgettable way. This box is ideal for that high-impact celebration where class meets cash, all wrapped in florals and finesse.

name: XOXO Deluxe
description: bouquet of 20 Fresh Roses, Box of 20 Fresh Roses, 7” Buttercream cake, Gift hamper with Moet Champagne, Heartshaped Hellium Balloons, Lips Balloon, Customized Bubble Balloon.

name: For My Favourite Person
description: The perfect birthday or romantic gift for someone who loves all things pink. Package includes: 20 Red Heart Hellium Balloons, 50 Red Roses wrapped with gysofilla around.

name: ROSE LUXE EXPERIENCE
description: Transform your celebration into a breathtaking floral dreamscape with our Rosé Luxe Experience. Designed with rich layers of pink florals, mirrored table accents, premium velvet seating, and soft candlelight, this setup creates the perfect ambience for an unforgettable intimate event. Every detail is styled to feel elegant, feminine, and luxury — giving your guests a visually stunning moment from every angle. N.B - Color theme can be changed

name: The Romance Suite
description: A premium room setup with ceiling balloons, 30 hellium balloons, candles, rose petals, floor balloons - designed to set the perfect mood for love, surprise and celebration in a romantic space.

name: Butterflies & Bloom backdrop
description: This pastel setup brings elegance, sweetness and a playful touch to any celebration.

name: TEMMY'S DESIGN
description: A soft, enchanting blend of blush, nude, and pink balloons arranged in a luxurious cascading style. Modern round arch, pastel clusters, and a signature name panel.

name: Amore Gift Set
description: A stunning romantic package curated to make your loved one feel adored. Comes with a bubble balloon, premium bouquet of 20 roses, chocolates, wine, and an 8' cake — all styled to create an unforgettable moment.

name: Blossoms of Love
description: A beautiful rose bouquet and matching heart balloons that create an unforgettable moment for someone special.

name: Loving You
description: Bright, elegant, and full of emotion. A luxurious mix of 20 gold and red heart balloons paired with a floral arrangement of 65 yellow and red roses.

name: The Opulence Box
description: A refined mix of roses and premium delights, crafted for those with a taste for luxury and meaningful gifting.

name: The Grand Gesture Package
description: The Grand Gesture Package is the perfect way to express 'I choose you, today and always.' Crafted for unforgettable celebration, includes bouquet of 50 Roses, Dummy Cheque, Luxury Giftbox of Moët Champagne, Chocolates, Gift Items, Large Sized Double Stuffed Orbs Helium Balloon, Heart, Lip, and Star Helium Balloons.

name: Love Overload Package
description: The Love Overload Package is the ultimate way to say 'I choose you, today and always.' For unforgettable celebration, includes bouquet of 20 Fresh Roses, Box of 20 Fresh Roses, Mixed Flowers bouquet, 7” Heartshaped Cake, 7” Round Cake, 2 Double Stuffed Bubble Helium Balloon, 10 Heart Helium Balloons, Lip Helium Balloon.

name: Founder's Favourite
description: A timeless blend of elegance and purity — featuring 20 white heart balloons paired with a lush bouquet of 50 premium white roses.

name: Rose Luxe Grandeur - 300 Roses
description: An opulent design of 300 fresh pink roses in romantic tones arranged as a full, rounded silhouette. Ideal for celebrating love, milestones, or simply making someone feel truly special.

name: Pink Charm
description: 20 Pink Roses with pink baby breath

name: Morayo
description: Inspired by the meaning of the name Morayo — 'I see joy' — this arrangement captures happiness in full colour. A vibrant bouquet crafted with fresh lilies, roses, spray roses, and exotic flowers.

name: Pure Harmony
description: Introducing Pure Harmony, a beautifully curated gift experience designed for moments that call for softness, elegance, and heartfelt expression. Includes: bouquet of 40 white roses, Fresh fruit platter, Luxury Gift Box.

name: Yoyo's Pink Hues
description: A bright, bubbly splash of pink for the girl who loves all things sweet and soft.

name: Classic Romance
description: 40 Purple and Pink Roses, wrapped with green and pink hypericum berries and fillers. 10 Pink and Red heart helium balloons.

name: Love Overdose
description: When love is too much to be contained, it spills into every detail. Love Overdose transforms your space into an intimate, romantic haven with balloons, petals, soft lights, and curated surprises.

name: The Pastel Experience
description: Luxury setup including heart-shaped balloon backdrop, floral vase arrangement, candelabras, ceiling & cluster balloons, rose petals, and custom orbs. Designed for birthday, anniversaries, or romantic-surprises.

name: The breakfast Luxe Box
description: A beautifully curated morning experience featuring gourmet pastries, fresh fruits, sweet bites, and sparkling drink in a signature acrylic box. Perfect for birthday, love-notes, morning-surprises, and elevated gifting.

name: The Eden Baby backdrop
description: A soft, elegant baby-shower backdrop with lush green tones, gold features, nude accents, draped fabric, balloon clusters, floral details, and signature 'Oh Baby' sign. Perfect for baby-showers, gender-reveals, maternity shoots, and welcome-baby gifts.

name: The Princess Treatment Package
description: Premium soft-life birthday experience including balloon backdrop, 500,000 cash in luxury box, 7” cake, bouquet of 30 roses, and chocolate treatbox.

name: Classic Trio Set
description: A beautifully curated trio featuring a custom bubble balloon, fresh floral bouquet, and birthday cake. Perfect for simple, thoughtful celebration that feel premium and photo-ready.

name: The celebration Set
description: Designed to make celebration effortless and elegant. Includes double stuffed custom bubble balloon, bouquet of helium balloons, 2-tier birthday cake, and large fresh flower arrangement.

name: Fresh Fruit Box
description: A premium selection of fresh, handpicked fruits arranged beautifully in a black velvet wooden box. Includes apples, oranges, lemons, kiwis, blueberries, strawberries, and grapes.

name: The Gentlemen's Signature Hamper
description: A refined curation for the modern gentleman — featuring whiskey, rum, gourmet biscuits, luxury treats, keepsake mug, scented candle, and pamper set.

name: The Signature Rose Initial bouquet
description: A stunning arrangement of 100 fresh red roses designed with a personalized name initial at the center — bold, romantic, and unforgettable. Available in red, pink, white, and mixed colors.
